original_title: Inside North Korea: Then and Now with Lisa Ling
overview: Correspondent Lisa Ling manages to penetrate its border by travelling undercover, pretending to work with a Nepalese eye surgeon on a humanitarian mission. Lisaâ€™s time in North Korea offers a rare glimpse of everyday life in the country and some of the issues its people face.
title: Inside North Korea: Then and Now with Lisa Ling
